name: Adobong Manok
ingredients_str: Chicken: 1 kg;Garlic: 8 cloves;Onions: 1 large;Salt: 1 tsp;Pepper: 1 tsp
steps_str: 1. Marinate chicken with garlic, salt, and pepper for 15 minutes.;2. Sauté onions until translucent.;3. Add chicken and brown on all sides.;4. Add water and simmer for 30 minutes until tender.;5. Reduce sauce until thick.;6. Serve hot with rice.

name: Sinigang na Baboy
ingredients_str: Pork: 1 kg;Tomato: 2 large;Onions: 1 large;WaterSpinach: 1 bundle;Okra: 10 pieces;Eggplant: 2;SilingLabuyo: 3 pieces;FishSauce: 2 tbsp
steps_str: 1. Boil pork in water for 10 minutes, skim scum.;2. Add tomatoes and onions, simmer for 40 minutes.;3. Season with fish sauce.;4. Add okra and eggplant, cook 7 minutes.;5. Add water spinach and chilies, cook 2 minutes.;6. Serve hot.

name: Bicol Express
ingredients_str: Pork: 500g;CoconutMilk: 2 cups;SilingLabuyo: 15 pieces;Garlic: 5 cloves;Onions: 1;Ginger: 1 thumb;Shrimp: 1/2 cup
steps_str: 1. Sauté garlic, onions, and ginger.;2. Add pork and brown.;3. Pour coconut milk and simmer 20 minutes.;4. Add shrimp and chilies, cook 7 minutes.;5. Reduce until thick and oily.;6. Serve with rice.

name: Pinakbet
ingredients_str: Pork: 250g;Eggplant: 2;Okra: 10 pieces;BitterMelon: 1;Pumpkin: 2 cups;Tomato: 1;Garlic: 4 cloves;Onions: 1;Ginger: 1 thumb
steps_str: 1. Sauté garlic, onion, ginger, and tomato.;2. Add pork and cook until done.;3. Layer pumpkin and bitter melon with water, simmer 5 minutes.;4. Add eggplant and okra, simmer 10 minutes.;5. Mix gently.;6. Serve hot.

name: Laing
ingredients_str: TaroLeaves: 2 cups;Pork: 200g;CoconutMilk: 4 cups;SilingLabuyo: 10 pieces;Garlic: 5 cloves;Onions: 1;Ginger: 1 thumb
steps_str: 1. Sauté garlic, onion, and ginger.;2. Add pork and brown.;3. Pour 2 cups coconut milk and boil.;4. Add taro leaves and chilies, DO NOT STIR, simmer 20 minutes.;5. Stir and add remaining coconut milk, simmer 20 minutes.;6. Serve hot.

name: Tinolang Manok
ingredients_str: Chicken: 1 kg;Ginger: 1 thumb;Garlic: 4 cloves;Onions: 1;Papaya: 2 cups;Pechay: 1 bundle;FishSauce: 3 tbsp;Pepper: 1 tsp
steps_str: 1. Sauté ginger, garlic, and onion.;2. Add chicken and cook until color changes.;3. Add water and fish sauce, boil then simmer 25 minutes.;4. Add papaya and cook 7 minutes.;5. Add pechay and pepper, cook 2 minutes.;6. Serve hot.

name: Ginataang Manok
ingredients_str: Chicken: 1 kg;CoconutMilk: 2 cups;Garlic: 5 cloves;Onions: 1;Ginger: 1 thumb;FishSauce: 2 tbsp;Pechay: 1 bundle;SilingLabuyo: 4 pieces;Papaya: 1 cup
steps_str: 1. Sauté garlic, onion, and ginger.;2. Brown chicken pieces.;3. Pour coconut milk, add fish sauce, simmer 25 minutes.;4. Add papaya, cook 5 minutes.;5. Add pechay and chilies, cook 2 minutes.;6. Serve hot.

name: Ginataang Hipon
ingredients_str: Shrimp: 500g;CoconutMilk: 2 cups;Eggplant: 1;Garlic: 4 cloves;Onions: 1;Ginger: 1 thumb;SilingLabuyo: 5 pieces;FishSauce: 2 tbsp;Tanglad: 2 stalks
steps_str: 1. Sauté garlic, onion, and ginger.;2. Add shrimp and cook until pink.;3. Pour coconut milk, add tanglad, simmer 5 minutes.;4. Add eggplant, simmer 5 minutes.;5. Add fish sauce and chilies, cook 2 minutes.;6. Remove tanglad and serve.

name: Adobong Pusit
ingredients_str: Squid: 1 kg;Garlic: 6 cloves;Onions: 1;Pepper: 1 tsp
steps_str: 1. Sauté garlic and onion.;2. Add squid and cook 2 minutes.;3. Add water and pepper, DO NOT STIR for 2 minutes.;4. Simmer 15 minutes until tender.;5. Reduce sauce if needed.;6. Serve hot.

name: Sinigang na Hipon
ingredients_str: Shrimp: 500g;Tomato: 2;Onions: 1;FishSauce: 2 tbsp;WaterSpinach: 1 bundle;Okra: 10 pieces;Eggplant: 1;SilingLabuyo: 2 pieces
steps_str: 1. Boil water, add tomato and onion.;2. Add okra and eggplant, cook 5 minutes.;3. Season with fish sauce.;4. Add shrimp, cook 4 minutes until pink.;5. Add water spinach and chilies, cook 1 minute.;6. Serve hot.

name: Ginataang Alimasag
ingredients_str: Crab: 2 large;Pork: 250g;CoconutMilk: 2 cups;SilingLabuyo: 10 pieces;Garlic: 5 cloves;Onions: 1;Ginger: 1 thumb
steps_str: 1. Sauté garlic, onion, and ginger.;2. Add pork and brown.;3. Add crab pieces, cook 3 minutes.;4. Pour coconut milk, simmer 15 minutes.;5. Add chilies, simmer 5 minutes.;6. Serve hot.

name: Ginataang Puso ng Saging
ingredients_str: CoconutMilk: 2 cups;Shrimp: 1/2 cup;Pork: 200g;Garlic: 4 cloves;Onions: 1;Ginger: 1 thumb;SilingLabuyo: 5 pieces
steps_str: 1. Sauté garlic, onion, and ginger.;2. Add pork and shrimp, cook until done.;3. Pour coconut milk, simmer 15 minutes.;4. Add chilies, cook 2 minutes.;5. Adjust seasoning.;6. Serve hot.

name: Ginataang Kalabasa
ingredients_str: Pumpkin: 2 cups;Shrimp: 1/2 cup;CoconutMilk: 2 cups;Garlic: 4 cloves;Onions: 1;Ginger: 1 thumb;FishSauce: 2 tbsp
steps_str: 1. Sauté garlic, onion, and ginger.;2. Add shrimp, cook until pink.;3. Add pumpkin, cook 3 minutes.;4. Pour coconut milk, simmer 10 minutes.;5. Season with fish sauce.;6. Serve hot.

name: Adobong Kangkong
ingredients_str: WaterSpinach: 1 bundle;Garlic: 5 cloves;Onions: 1;Pepper: 1/2 tsp
steps_str: 1. Sauté garlic and onion.;2. Add kangkong stems, cook 2 minutes.;3. Add water and pepper, DO NOT STIR for 1 minute.;4. Add kangkong leaves, cook 2 minutes.;5. Mix well.;6. Serve immediately.

name: Ginataang Tilapia
ingredients_str: Fish: 4 pieces;CoconutMilk: 2 cups;Eggplant: 1;Garlic: 4 cloves;Onions: 1;Ginger: 1 thumb;SilingLabuyo: 3 pieces;FishSauce: 2 tbsp;Tanglad: 2 stalks
steps_str: 1. Lightly fry fish, set aside.;2. Sauté garlic, onion, and ginger.;3. Pour coconut milk, add tanglad, simmer 5 minutes.;4. Add eggplant, simmer 5 minutes.;5. Add fish and chilies, add fish sauce, simmer 3 minutes.;6. Remove tanglad and serve.

name: Ginataang Kuhol
ingredients_str: CoconutMilk: 2 cups;Eggplant: 1;Garlic: 4 cloves;Onions: 1;Ginger: 1 thumb;SilingLabuyo: 5 pieces;FishSauce: 2 tbsp;Tanglad: 2 stalks
steps_str: 1. Sauté garlic, onion, and ginger.;2. Pour coconut milk, add tanglad, simmer 10 minutes.;3. Add eggplant, simmer 5 minutes.;4. Add fish sauce and chilies, cook 2 minutes.;5. Remove tanglad.;6. Serve hot.

name: Sinantol
ingredients_str: Pork: 250g;Shrimp: 1/2 cup;CoconutMilk: 2 cups;SilingLabuyo: 5 pieces;Garlic: 4 cloves;Onions: 1;Ginger: 1 thumb
steps_str: 1. Sauté garlic, onion, and ginger.;2. Add pork and shrimp, cook until done.;3. Pour coconut milk, simmer 15 minutes.;4. Add chilies, cook 2 minutes.;5. Adjust seasoning.;6. Serve hot.

name: Tinolang Isda
ingredients_str: Fish: 4 pieces;Ginger: 1 thumb;Garlic: 4 cloves;Onions: 1;Tomato: 1;Papaya: 2 cups;Pechay: 1 bundle;FishSauce: 2 tbsp
steps_str: 1. Sauté ginger, garlic, onion, and tomato.;2. Add water and fish sauce, bring to boil.;3. Add papaya, cook 7 minutes.;4. Gently add fish, cook 10 minutes.;5. Add pechay, cook 2 minutes.;6. Serve hot.

name: Ginataang Upo
ingredients_str: Upo: 3 cups;Shrimp: 1/2 cup;CoconutMilk: 2 cups;Garlic: 4 cloves;Onions: 1;Ginger: 1 thumb;FishSauce: 2 tbsp
steps_str: 1. Sauté garlic, onion, and ginger.;2. Add shrimp, cook until pink.;3. Add upo, cook 3 minutes.;4. Pour coconut milk, simmer 10 minutes.;5. Season with fish sauce.;6. Serve hot.

name: Ginataang Mais
ingredients_str: Corn: 3 cups;CoconutMilk: 2 cups;Shrimp: 1/2 cup;Garlic: 4 cloves;Onions: 1;Ginger: 1 thumb;FishSauce: 2 tbsp
steps_str: 1. Sauté garlic, onion, and ginger.;2. Add shrimp, cook until pink.;3. Add corn, cook 3 minutes.;4. Pour coconut milk, simmer 10 minutes.;5. Season with fish sauce.;6. Serve hot.

name: Paksiw na Isda
ingredients_str: Fish: 4 pieces;Ginger: 1 thumb;Garlic: 6 cloves;Onions: 1;Eggplant: 1;SilingLabuyo: 3 pieces;FishSauce: 2 tbsp;Pepper: 1 tsp
steps_str: 1. Layer ginger, garlic, and onion in pot.;2. Place fish on top, add eggplant.;3. Add water, fish sauce, and pepper, DO NOT STIR.;4. Bring to boil, simmer 15 minutes.;5. Add chilies, cook 2 minutes.;6. Serve hot.

name: Paksiw na Pata
ingredients_str: Pork: 1.5 kg pork hock;Garlic: 10 cloves;Onions: 2;SabaBanana: 3;Pechay: 1 bundle;Pepper: 2 tbsp;Salt: 1 tsp
steps_str: 1. Boil pork hock with garlic, onions, and pepper for 1.5 hours.;2. Add banana, cook 10 minutes.;3. Add pechay, cook 2 minutes.;4. Season with salt.;5. Let sauce thicken.;6. Serve hot.

name: Inihaw na Liempo
ingredients_str: Pork: 1 kg belly;Kalamansi: 10 pieces;Garlic: 10 cloves;Pepper: 2 tbsp;Salt: 2 tsp
steps_str: 1. Pound garlic with salt and pepper.;2. Rub mixture all over pork.;3. Add kalamansi juice and marinate 4 hours.;4. Grill over charcoal 20 minutes, turning often.;5. Let rest 5 minutes.;6. Slice and serve.

name: Inihaw na Manok
ingredients_str: Chicken: 1 kg;Kalamansi: 10 pieces;Garlic: 10 cloves;Ginger: 1 thumb;Pepper: 1 tbsp;Salt: 1 tsp
steps_str: 1. Mix kalamansi juice, garlic, ginger, pepper, and salt.;2. Marinate chicken 4 hours.;3. Grill over charcoal 30 minutes, turning often.;4. Baste with marinade.;5. Cook until done.;6. Serve hot.

name: Inihaw na Pusit
ingredients_str: Squid: 1 kg;Kalamansi: 8 pieces;Garlic: 6 cloves;Ginger: 1 thumb;Pepper: 1 tsp;Salt: 1 tsp
steps_str: 1. Clean squid thoroughly.;2. Mix kalamansi juice, garlic, ginger, pepper, and salt.;3. Marinate squid 30 minutes.;4. Grill over charcoal 15 minutes.;5. Do not overcook.;6. Serve with dipping sauce.

name: Inihaw na Isda
ingredients_str: Fish: 4 pieces;Kalamansi: 6 pieces;Garlic: 6 cloves;Ginger: 1 thumb;Tomato: 2;Onions: 1;Pepper: 1 tsp;Salt: 1 tsp
steps_str: 1. Clean and score fish.;2. Stuff belly with tomato, onion, ginger, and garlic.;3. Rub with kalamansi, salt, and pepper.;4. Grill over charcoal 20 minutes, turning once.;5. Cook until skin is crispy.;6. Serve hot.

name: Inihaw na Hipon
ingredients_str: Shrimp: 500g;Kalamansi: 6 pieces;Garlic: 6 cloves;Pepper: 1 tsp;Salt: 1 tsp
steps_str: 1. Clean shrimp, leave shells on.;2. Mix kalamansi juice, garlic, pepper, and salt.;3. Marinate 30 minutes.;4. Grill over charcoal 10 minutes.;5. Turn once when pink.;6. Serve immediately.

name: Ginisang Ampalaya
ingredients_str: BitterMelon: 2;Egg: 2;Tomato: 1;Onions: 1;Garlic: 4 cloves;Shrimp: 1/2 cup;FishSauce: 1 tbsp
steps_str: 1. Sauté garlic, onion, and tomato.;2. Add shrimp, cook until pink.;3. Add bitter melon, cook 5 minutes.;4. Season with fish sauce.;5. Push to side, scramble eggs.;6. Mix and serve.

name: Ginisang Upo
ingredients_str: Upo: 3 cups;Shrimp: 1/2 cup;Tomato: 1;Onions: 1;Garlic: 4 cloves;FishSauce: 1 tbsp
steps_str: 1. Sauté garlic, onion, and tomato.;2. Add shrimp, cook until pink.;3. Add upo, cook 10 minutes.;4. Season with fish sauce.;5. Add water if needed.;6. Serve hot.

name: Ginisang Patola
ingredients_str: SpongeGourd: 3 cups;Shrimp: 1/2 cup;Tomato: 1;Onions: 1;Garlic: 4 cloves;FishSauce: 1 tbsp
steps_str: 1. Sauté garlic, onion, and tomato.;2. Add shrimp, cook until pink.;3. Add sponge gourd, cook 10 minutes.;4. Season with fish sauce.;5. Add water if needed.;6. Serve hot.

name: Tortang Talong
ingredients_str: Eggplant: 4;Egg: 4;Garlic: 4 cloves;Onions: 1;Tomato: 1;Salt: 1 tsp;Pepper: 1/2 tsp
steps_str: 1. Grill eggplant until soft, peel skin.;2. Flatten with fork.;3. Beat eggs with salt and pepper.;4. Dip eggplant in egg mixture.;5. Fry until golden on both sides.;6. Serve with ketchup or fish sauce.

name: Tortang Giniling
ingredients_str: Pork: 250g ground;Egg: 4;Onions: 1;Garlic: 4 cloves;Tomato: 1;Pepper: 1 tsp;Salt: 1 tsp
steps_str: 1. Sauté garlic, onion, and tomato.;2. Add ground pork, cook until brown.;3. Season with salt and pepper, cool.;4. Beat eggs, mix with cooked pork.;5. Fry patties until golden on both sides.;6. Serve hot.

name: Pritong Isda
ingredients_str: Fish: 4 pieces;Garlic: 6 cloves;Salt: 1 tsp;Pepper: 1 tsp
steps_str: 1. Clean and score fish.;2. Rub with salt and pepper.;3. Heat oil in pan.;4. Fry fish until golden and crispy on both sides.;5. Drain excess oil.;6. Serve with vinegar dip and tomatoes.

name: Pritong Manok
ingredients_str: Chicken: 1 kg pieces;Garlic: 8 cloves;Kalamansi: 6 pieces;Salt: 1 tsp;Pepper: 1 tsp
steps_str: 1. Marinate chicken with kalamansi, garlic, salt, and pepper for 30 minutes.;2. Heat oil in pan.;3. Fry chicken pieces until golden brown.;4. Cover and cook through, about 25 minutes.;5. Drain excess oil.;6. Serve hot with rice.

name: Pritong Talong
ingredients_str: Eggplant: 4;Garlic: 4 cloves crushed;Salt: 1 tsp
steps_str: 1. Slice eggplant lengthwise or in rounds.;2. Sprinkle with salt.;3. Heat oil in pan.;4. Fry eggplant until golden and soft.;5. Add crushed garlic while frying.;6. Drain and serve.

name: Ensaladang Talong
ingredients_str: Eggplant: 4;Tomato: 2;Onions: 1;FishSauce: 2 tbsp;Kalamansi: 4 pieces
steps_str: 1. Grill eggplant until soft.;2. Peel and chop roughly.;3. Chop tomatoes and onions.;4. Mix vegetables together.;5. Season with fish sauce and kalamansi juice.;6. Serve as side dish.

name: Ensaladang Pipino
ingredients_str: Tomato: 3;Onions: 1;FishSauce: 2 tbsp;Kalamansi: 4 pieces;SilingLabuyo: 2 pieces
steps_str: 1. Slice tomatoes and onions thinly.;2. Chop chilies.;3. Mix vegetables in bowl.;4. Season with fish sauce and kalamansi juice.;5. Let sit 10 minutes.;6. Serve as side dish.

name: Sinaing na Isda
ingredients_str: Fish: 4 pieces;Ginger: 1 thumb;Garlic: 8 cloves;Tomato: 2;SilingLabuyo: 4 pieces;FishSauce: 2 tbsp;Pepper: 1 tsp
steps_str: 1. Layer ginger and garlic in pot.;2. Place fish on top.;3. Add tomatoes and chilies.;4. Add fish sauce, pepper, and little water.;5. Cover and simmer 30 minutes.;6. Serve hot.

name: Sinaing na Tulingan
ingredients_str: Fish: 4 pieces tulingan;Ginger: 1 thumb;Garlic: 10 cloves;SilingLabuyo: 6 pieces;FishSauce: 3 tbsp;Pepper: 1 tsp
steps_str: 1. Layer ginger and garlic in pot.;2. Arrange fish in pot.;3. Add chilies, fish sauce, and pepper.;4. Add water to half-cover fish.;5. Simmer 45 minutes until sauce is thick.;6. Serve hot.

name: Pinaputok na Tilapia
ingredients_str: Fish: 4 tilapia;Tomato: 2;Onions: 1;Ginger: 1 thumb;SilingLabuyo: 4 pieces;FishSauce: 2 tbsp;Kalamansi: 4 pieces
steps_str: 1. Score fish and season with salt.;2. Stuff with tomato, onion, ginger, and chilies.;3. Wrap each fish in foil or banana leaves.;4. Grill or bake 20 minutes.;5. Open and drizzle with fish sauce and kalamansi.;6. Serve hot.

name: Relyenong Manok
ingredients_str: Chicken: 1 whole;Pork: 250g ground;Egg: 2;Garlic: 6 cloves;Onions: 1;Pepper: 1 tsp;Salt: 1 tsp
steps_str: 1. Debone chicken carefully, keeping skin intact.;2. Mix ground pork, eggs, garlic, onions, salt, and pepper.;3. Stuff mixture inside chicken.;4. Sew or tie opening.;5. Roast or bake 1.5 hours until golden.;6. Slice and serve.

name: Relyenong Bangus
ingredients_str: Fish: 2 large milkfish;Tomato: 2;Onions: 1;Garlic: 6 cloves;Egg: 1;Pepper: 1 tsp;Salt: 1 tsp
steps_str: 1. Carefully remove fish meat, keeping skin intact.;2. Flake fish meat and mix with chopped tomato, onion, garlic, egg, salt, and pepper.;3. Stuff mixture back into fish skin.;4. Wrap in foil or banana leaves.;5. Grill or bake 30 minutes.;6. Slice and serve.

name: Sinuglaw
ingredients_str: Fish: 300g;Pork: 200g grilled;Onions: 2;Ginger: 1 thumb;SilingLabuyo: 5 pieces;Kalamansi: 8 pieces;FishSauce: 2 tbsp
steps_str: 1. Grill pork until crispy, chop into pieces.;2. Cube fresh fish and marinate in kalamansi juice 10 minutes.;3. Drain fish slightly.;4. Mix fish and pork with onions, ginger, and chilies.;5. Season with fish sauce and more kalamansi.;6. Serve cold.

name: Kilawing Isda
ingredients_str: Fish: 500g fresh;Kalamansi: 12 pieces;Onions: 2;Ginger: 1 thumb;SilingLabuyo: 5 pieces;CoconutMilk: 1/2 cup;Salt: 1 tsp
steps_str: 1. Cube fresh fish.;2. Marinate in kalamansi juice 15 minutes.;3. Drain most liquid.;4. Add onions, ginger, chilies, and salt.;5. Mix in coconut milk.;6. Chill 30 minutes and serve.

name: Ginataang Gabi
ingredients_str: TaroRoots: 3 cups cubed;CoconutMilk: 2 cups;Shrimp: 1/2 cup;Garlic: 4 cloves;Onions: 1;Ginger: 1 thumb;FishSauce: 2 tbsp;SilingLabuyo: 3 pieces
steps_str: 1. Sauté garlic, onion, and ginger.;2. Add shrimp, cook until pink.;3. Add taro, cook 5 minutes.;4. Pour coconut milk, simmer 15 minutes until taro is tender.;5. Add fish sauce and chilies.;6. Serve hot.

name: Nilaga na Baka
ingredients_str: Pork: 1 kg beef shank;Corn: 2 ears;Pumpkin: 2 cups;Pechay: 1 bundle;Onions: 1;Pepper: 1 tbsp;FishSauce: 3 tbsp
steps_str: 1. Boil beef in water 2 hours until tender.;2. Add onions and pepper.;3. Season with fish sauce.;4. Add corn, cook 10 minutes.;5. Add pumpkin, cook 10 minutes.;6. Add pechay, cook 2 minutes and serve.

name: Nilaga na Baboy
ingredients_str: Pork: 1 kg;Corn: 2 ears;Pumpkin: 2 cups;Pechay: 1 bundle;Onions: 1;Pepper: 1 tbsp;FishSauce: 3 tbsp
steps_str: 1. Boil pork in water 1 hour until tender.;2. Add onions and pepper.;3. Season with fish sauce.;4. Add corn, cook 10 minutes.;5. Add pumpkin, cook 10 minutes.;6. Add pechay, cook 2 minutes and serve.

name: Sinigang na Isda
ingredients_str: Fish: 4 pieces;Tomato: 2;Onions: 1;Okra: 8 pieces;Eggplant: 1;WaterSpinach: 1 bundle;SilingLabuyo: 2 pieces;FishSauce: 2 tbsp
steps_str: 1. Boil water with tomato and onion.;2. Add okra and eggplant, cook 5 minutes.;3. Season with fish sauce.;4. Gently add fish, cook 10 minutes.;5. Add water spinach and chilies, cook 1 minute.;6. Serve hot.

name: Pesang Isda
ingredients_str: Fish: 4 pieces;Ginger: 1 thumb;Garlic: 6 cloves;Onions: 1;Tomato: 2;Pechay: 1 bundle;FishSauce: 2 tbsp;Pepper: 1 tsp
steps_str: 1. Sauté ginger, garlic, and onion.;2. Add tomatoes, cook until soft.;3. Add water and fish sauce, bring to boil.;4. Add fish, simmer 15 minutes.;5. Add pechay and pepper, cook 2 minutes.;6. Serve hot.

name: Caldereta
ingredients_str: Beef: 1.5 kg;Potatoes: 3;Carrots: 2;Bell Pepper: 1;Tomato Sauce: 2 cups;Liver Spread: 1/2 cup;Cheese: 1/4 cup;Green Olives: 1/4 cup;Garlic: 6 cloves;Onion: 1;Bay Leaves: 2;Water: 2 cups;Oil: 2 tbsp
steps_str: 1. Brown beef in oil.;2. Sauté garlic, onion, and beef.;3. Add tomato sauce, liver spread, bay leaves, and water. Simmer 60-90 mins.;4. Add potatoes and carrots, cook 15 mins.;5. Add bell pepper, olives, and cheese. Cook 5 mins.;6. Serve hot.

name: Chopsuey
ingredients_str: Pork: 250g;Cauliflower: 1 cup;Carrots: 1 cup;Cabbage: 2 cups;Snow Peas: 1 cup;Bell Pepper: 1;Broccoli: 1 cup;Garlic: 4 cloves;Onion: 1;Oyster Sauce: 3 tbsp;Soy Sauce: 1 tbsp;Chicken Broth: 1 cup;Cornstarch: 1 tbsp;Oil: 2 tbsp
steps_str: 1. Sauté garlic, onion, and pork until cooked.;2. Add carrots, cauliflower, broccoli. Stir-fry 3 mins.;3. Add broth, oyster sauce, soy sauce. Simmer 5 mins.;4. Add cabbage, bell pepper, snow peas. Cook 2 mins.;5. Thicken with cornstarch slurry.;6. Serve immediately.

name: Ginisang Gulay
ingredients_str: Ground Pork: 250g;Squash: 2 cups;String Beans: 1 cup;Eggplant: 2;Tomatoes: 2;Garlic: 4 cloves;Onion: 1;Fish Sauce: 1 tbsp;Oil: 2 tbsp;Water: 1/2 cup
steps_str: 1. Sauté garlic, onion, and tomatoes.;2. Add ground pork, cook until brown.;3. Add squash and water, simmer 5 mins.;4. Add string beans and eggplant, cook 7 mins.;5. Season with fish sauce.;6. Serve hot.

name: Kare-Kare
ingredients_str: Oxtail: 1 kg;Peanut Butter: 1 cup;Eggplant: 2;String Beans: 2 cups;Bok Choy: 1 bundle;Banana Blossom: 1;Garlic: 6 cloves;Onion: 1;Anatto Water: 1/2 cup;Rice Flour: 2 tbsp;Water: 8 cups;Shrimp Paste: to serve
steps_str: 1. Boil oxtail in water for 2-3 hours until tender.;2. Sauté garlic and onion.;3. Add oxtail and 4 cups broth.;4. Stir in peanut butter and rice flour.;5. Add annatto water for color.;6. Add vegetables and cook until tender.;7. Serve with shrimp paste.
ingredient_set: ['oxtail','peanut butter','eggplant','string beans','bok choy','banana blossom','garlic','onion','annatto water','rice flour','water','shrimp paste']

name: Pancit Canton
ingredients_str: Pancit Canton Noodles: 500g;Pork: 200g;Shrimp: 1 cup;Cabbage: 2 cups;Carrots: 1 cup;Celery: 1 cup;Snow Peas: 1 cup;Onion: 1;Garlic: 4 cloves;Oyster Sauce: 3 tbsp;Soy Sauce: 2 tbsp;Chicken Broth: 2 cups;Oil: 3 tbsp
steps_str: 1. Soak noodles in warm water.;2. Sauté garlic, onion, pork, and shrimp.;3. Add vegetables and stir-fry.;4. Add broth, oyster sauce, and soy sauce.;5. Add noodles and cook until liquid is absorbed.;6. Serve hot.

name: name
ingredients_str: ingredients_str
steps_str: steps_str

name: Adobong Manok
ingredients_str: Chicken: 1 kg;Garlic: 8 cloves;Onions: 1 large;Salt: 1 tsp;Pepper: 1 tsp
steps_str: 1. Marinate chicken with garlic, salt, and pepper for 15 minutes.;2. Sauté onions until translucent.;3. Add chicken and brown on all sides.;4. Add water and simmer for 30 minutes until tender.;5. Reduce sauce until thick.;6. Serve hot with rice.

name: Sinigang na Baboy
ingredients_str: Pork: 1 kg;Tomato: 2 large;Onions: 1 large;WaterSpinach: 1 bundle;Okra: 10 pieces;Eggplant: 2;SilingLabuyo: 3 pieces;FishSauce: 2 tbsp
steps_str: 1. Boil pork in water for 10 minutes, skim scum.;2. Add tomatoes and onions, simmer for 40 minutes.;3. Season with fish sauce.;4. Add okra and eggplant, cook 7 minutes.;5. Add water spinach and chilies, cook 2 minutes.;6. Serve hot.

name: Bicol Express
ingredients_str: Pork: 500g;CoconutMilk: 2 cups;SilingLabuyo: 15 pieces;Garlic: 5 cloves;Onions: 1;Ginger: 1 thumb;Shrimp: 1/2 cup
steps_str: 1. Sauté garlic, onions, and ginger.;2. Add pork and brown.;3. Pour coconut milk and simmer 20 minutes.;4. Add shrimp and chilies, cook 7 minutes.;5. Reduce until thick and oily.;6. Serve with rice.

name: Pinakbet
ingredients_str: Pork: 250g;Eggplant: 2;Okra: 10 pieces;BitterMelon: 1;Pumpkin: 2 cups;Tomato: 1;Garlic: 4 cloves;Onions: 1;Ginger: 1 thumb
steps_str: 1. Sauté garlic, onion, ginger, and tomato.;2. Add pork and cook until done.;3. Layer pumpkin and bitter melon with water, simmer 5 minutes.;4. Add eggplant and okra, simmer 10 minutes.;5. Mix gently.;6. Serve hot.

name: Laing
ingredients_str: TaroLeaves: 2 cups;Pork: 200g;CoconutMilk: 4 cups;SilingLabuyo: 10 pieces;Garlic: 5 cloves;Onions: 1;Ginger: 1 thumb
steps_str: 1. Sauté garlic, onion, and ginger.;2. Add pork and brown.;3. Pour 2 cups coconut milk and boil.;4. Add taro leaves and chilies, DO NOT STIR, simmer 20 minutes.;5. Stir and add remaining coconut milk, simmer 20 minutes.;6. Serve hot.

name: Tinolang Manok
ingredients_str: Chicken: 1 kg;Ginger: 1 thumb;Garlic: 4 cloves;Onions: 1;Papaya: 2 cups;Pechay: 1 bundle;FishSauce: 3 tbsp;Pepper: 1 tsp
steps_str: 1. Sauté ginger, garlic, and onion.;2. Add chicken and cook until color changes.;3. Add water and fish sauce, boil then simmer 25 minutes.;4. Add papaya and cook 7 minutes.;5. Add pechay and pepper, cook 2 minutes.;6. Serve hot.

name: Ginataang Manok
ingredients_str: Chicken: 1 kg;CoconutMilk: 2 cups;Garlic: 5 cloves;Onions: 1;Ginger: 1 thumb;FishSauce: 2 tbsp;Pechay: 1 bundle;SilingLabuyo: 4 pieces;Papaya: 1 cup
steps_str: 1. Sauté garlic, onion, and ginger.;2. Brown chicken pieces.;3. Pour coconut milk, add fish sauce, simmer 25 minutes.;4. Add papaya, cook 5 minutes.;5. Add pechay and chilies, cook 2 minutes.;6. Serve hot.

name: Ginataang Hipon
ingredients_str: Shrimp: 500g;CoconutMilk: 2 cups;Eggplant: 1;Garlic: 4 cloves;Onions: 1;Ginger: 1 thumb;SilingLabuyo: 5 pieces;FishSauce: 2 tbsp;Tanglad: 2 stalks
steps_str: 1. Sauté garlic, onion, and ginger.;2. Add shrimp and cook until pink.;3. Pour coconut milk, add tanglad, simmer 5 minutes.;4. Add eggplant, simmer 5 minutes.;5. Add fish sauce and chilies, cook 2 minutes.;6. Remove tanglad and serve.

name: Adobong Pusit
ingredients_str: Squid: 1 kg;Garlic: 6 cloves;Onions: 1;Pepper: 1 tsp
steps_str: 1. Sauté garlic and onion.;2. Add squid and cook 2 minutes.;3. Add water and pepper, DO NOT STIR for 2 minutes.;4. Simmer 15 minutes until tender.;5. Reduce sauce if needed.;6. Serve hot.

name: Sinigang na Hipon
ingredients_str: Shrimp: 500g;Tomato: 2;Onions: 1;FishSauce: 2 tbsp;WaterSpinach: 1 bundle;Okra: 10 pieces;Eggplant: 1;SilingLabuyo: 2 pieces
steps_str: 1. Boil water, add tomato and onion.;2. Add okra and eggplant, cook 5 minutes.;3. Season with fish sauce.;4. Add shrimp, cook 4 minutes until pink.;5. Add water spinach and chilies, cook 1 minute.;6. Serve hot.

name: Ginataang Alimasag
ingredients_str: Crab: 2 large;Pork: 250g;CoconutMilk: 2 cups;SilingLabuyo: 10 pieces;Garlic: 5 cloves;Onions: 1;Ginger: 1 thumb
steps_str: 1. Sauté garlic, onion, and ginger.;2. Add pork and brown.;3. Add crab pieces, cook 3 minutes.;4. Pour coconut milk, simmer 15 minutes.;5. Add chilies, simmer 5 minutes.;6. Serve hot.

name: Ginataang Puso ng Saging
ingredients_str: CoconutMilk: 2 cups;Shrimp: 1/2 cup;Pork: 200g;Garlic: 4 cloves;Onions: 1;Ginger: 1 thumb;SilingLabuyo: 5 pieces
steps_str: 1. Sauté garlic, onion, and ginger.;2. Add pork and shrimp, cook until done.;3. Pour coconut milk, simmer 15 minutes.;4. Add chilies, cook 2 minutes.;5. Adjust seasoning.;6. Serve hot.

name: Ginataang Kalabasa
ingredients_str: Pumpkin: 2 cups;Shrimp: 1/2 cup;CoconutMilk: 2 cups;Garlic: 4 cloves;Onions: 1;Ginger: 1 thumb;FishSauce: 2 tbsp
steps_str: 1. Sauté garlic, onion, and ginger.;2. Add shrimp, cook until pink.;3. Add pumpkin, cook 3 minutes.;4. Pour coconut milk, simmer 10 minutes.;5. Season with fish sauce.;6. Serve hot.

name: Adobong Kangkong
ingredients_str: WaterSpinach: 1 bundle;Garlic: 5 cloves;Onions: 1;Pepper: 1/2 tsp
steps_str: 1. Sauté garlic and onion.;2. Add kangkong stems, cook 2 minutes.;3. Add water and pepper, DO NOT STIR for 1 minute.;4. Add kangkong leaves, cook 2 minutes.;5. Mix well.;6. Serve immediately.

name: Ginataang Tilapia
ingredients_str: Fish: 4 pieces;CoconutMilk: 2 cups;Eggplant: 1;Garlic: 4 cloves;Onions: 1;Ginger: 1 thumb;SilingLabuyo: 3 pieces;FishSauce: 2 tbsp;Tanglad: 2 stalks
steps_str: 1. Lightly fry fish, set aside.;2. Sauté garlic, onion, and ginger.;3. Pour coconut milk, add tanglad, simmer 5 minutes.;4. Add eggplant, simmer 5 minutes.;5. Add fish and chilies, add fish sauce, simmer 3 minutes.;6. Remove tanglad and serve.

name: Ginataang Kuhol
ingredients_str: CoconutMilk: 2 cups;Eggplant: 1;Garlic: 4 cloves;Onions: 1;Ginger: 1 thumb;SilingLabuyo: 5 pieces;FishSauce: 2 tbsp;Tanglad: 2 stalks
steps_str: 1. Sauté garlic, onion, and ginger.;2. Pour coconut milk, add tanglad, simmer 10 minutes.;3. Add eggplant, simmer 5 minutes.;4. Add fish sauce and chilies, cook 2 minutes.;5. Remove tanglad.;6. Serve hot.

name: Sinantol
ingredients_str: Pork: 250g;Shrimp: 1/2 cup;CoconutMilk: 2 cups;SilingLabuyo: 5 pieces;Garlic: 4 cloves;Onions: 1;Ginger: 1 thumb
steps_str: 1. Sauté garlic, onion, and ginger.;2. Add pork and shrimp, cook until done.;3. Pour coconut milk, simmer 15 minutes.;4. Add chilies, cook 2 minutes.;5. Adjust seasoning.;6. Serve hot.

name: Tinolang Isda
ingredients_str: Fish: 4 pieces;Ginger: 1 thumb;Garlic: 4 cloves;Onions: 1;Tomato: 1;Papaya: 2 cups;Pechay: 1 bundle;FishSauce: 2 tbsp
steps_str: 1. Sauté ginger, garlic, onion, and tomato.;2. Add water and fish sauce, bring to boil.;3. Add papaya, cook 7 minutes.;4. Gently add fish, cook 10 minutes.;5. Add pechay, cook 2 minutes.;6. Serve hot.

name: Ginataang Upo
ingredients_str: Upo: 3 cups;Shrimp: 1/2 cup;CoconutMilk: 2 cups;Garlic: 4 cloves;Onions: 1;Ginger: 1 thumb;FishSauce: 2 tbsp
steps_str: 1. Sauté garlic, onion, and ginger.;2. Add shrimp, cook until pink.;3. Add upo, cook 3 minutes.;4. Pour coconut milk, simmer 10 minutes.;5. Season with fish sauce.;6. Serve hot.

name: Ginataang Mais
ingredients_str: Corn: 3 cups;CoconutMilk: 2 cups;Shrimp: 1/2 cup;Garlic: 4 cloves;Onions: 1;Ginger: 1 thumb;FishSauce: 2 tbsp
steps_str: 1. Sauté garlic, onion, and ginger.;2. Add shrimp, cook until pink.;3. Add corn, cook 3 minutes.;4. Pour coconut milk, simmer 10 minutes.;5. Season with fish sauce.;6. Serve hot.

name: Paksiw na Isda
ingredients_str: Fish: 4 pieces;Ginger: 1 thumb;Garlic: 6 cloves;Onions: 1;Eggplant: 1;SilingLabuyo: 3 pieces;FishSauce: 2 tbsp;Pepper: 1 tsp
steps_str: 1. Layer ginger, garlic, and onion in pot.;2. Place fish on top, add eggplant.;3. Add water, fish sauce, and pepper, DO NOT STIR.;4. Bring to boil, simmer 15 minutes.;5. Add chilies, cook 2 minutes.;6. Serve hot.

name: Paksiw na Pata
ingredients_str: Pork: 1.5 kg pork hock;Garlic: 10 cloves;Onions: 2;SabaBanana: 3;Pechay: 1 bundle;Pepper: 2 tbsp;Salt: 1 tsp
steps_str: 1. Boil pork hock with garlic, onions, and pepper for 1.5 hours.;2. Add banana, cook 10 minutes.;3. Add pechay, cook 2 minutes.;4. Season with salt.;5. Let sauce thicken.;6. Serve hot.

name: Inihaw na Liempo
ingredients_str: Pork: 1 kg belly;Kalamansi: 10 pieces;Garlic: 10 cloves;Pepper: 2 tbsp;Salt: 2 tsp
steps_str: 1. Pound garlic with salt and pepper.;2. Rub mixture all over pork.;3. Add kalamansi juice and marinate 4 hours.;4. Grill over charcoal 20 minutes, turning often.;5. Let rest 5 minutes.;6. Slice and serve.

name: Inihaw na Manok
ingredients_str: Chicken: 1 kg;Kalamansi: 10 pieces;Garlic: 10 cloves;Ginger: 1 thumb;Pepper: 1 tbsp;Salt: 1 tsp
steps_str: 1. Mix kalamansi juice, garlic, ginger, pepper, and salt.;2. Marinate chicken 4 hours.;3. Grill over charcoal 30 minutes, turning often.;4. Baste with marinade.;5. Cook until done.;6. Serve hot.

name: Inihaw na Pusit
ingredients_str: Squid: 1 kg;Kalamansi: 8 pieces;Garlic: 6 cloves;Ginger: 1 thumb;Pepper: 1 tsp;Salt: 1 tsp
steps_str: 1. Clean squid thoroughly.;2. Mix kalamansi juice, garlic, ginger, pepper, and salt.;3. Marinate squid 30 minutes.;4. Grill over charcoal 15 minutes.;5. Do not overcook.;6. Serve with dipping sauce.

name: Inihaw na Isda
ingredients_str: Fish: 4 pieces;Kalamansi: 6 pieces;Garlic: 6 cloves;Ginger: 1 thumb;Tomato: 2;Onions: 1;Pepper: 1 tsp;Salt: 1 tsp
steps_str: 1. Clean and score fish.;2. Stuff belly with tomato, onion, ginger, and garlic.;3. Rub with kalamansi, salt, and pepper.;4. Grill over charcoal 20 minutes, turning once.;5. Cook until skin is crispy.;6. Serve hot.

name: Inihaw na Hipon
ingredients_str: Shrimp: 500g;Kalamansi: 6 pieces;Garlic: 6 cloves;Pepper: 1 tsp;Salt: 1 tsp
steps_str: 1. Clean shrimp, leave shells on.;2. Mix kalamansi juice, garlic, pepper, and salt.;3. Marinate 30 minutes.;4. Grill over charcoal 10 minutes.;5. Turn once when pink.;6. Serve immediately.

name: Ginisang Ampalaya
ingredients_str: BitterMelon: 2;Egg: 2;Tomato: 1;Onions: 1;Garlic: 4 cloves;Shrimp: 1/2 cup;FishSauce: 1 tbsp
steps_str: 1. Sauté garlic, onion, and tomato.;2. Add shrimp, cook until pink.;3. Add bitter melon, cook 5 minutes.;4. Season with fish sauce.;5. Push to side, scramble eggs.;6. Mix and serve.

name: Ginisang Upo
ingredients_str: Upo: 3 cups;Shrimp: 1/2 cup;Tomato: 1;Onions: 1;Garlic: 4 cloves;FishSauce: 1 tbsp
steps_str: 1. Sauté garlic, onion, and tomato.;2. Add shrimp, cook until pink.;3. Add upo, cook 10 minutes.;4. Season with fish sauce.;5. Add water if needed.;6. Serve hot.

name: Ginisang Patola
ingredients_str: SpongeGourd: 3 cups;Shrimp: 1/2 cup;Tomato: 1;Onions: 1;Garlic: 4 cloves;FishSauce: 1 tbsp
steps_str: 1. Sauté garlic, onion, and tomato.;2. Add shrimp, cook until pink.;3. Add sponge gourd, cook 10 minutes.;4. Season with fish sauce.;5. Add water if needed.;6. Serve hot.

name: Tortang Talong
ingredients_str: Eggplant: 4;Egg: 4;Garlic: 4 cloves;Onions: 1;Tomato: 1;Salt: 1 tsp;Pepper: 1/2 tsp
steps_str: 1. Grill eggplant until soft, peel skin.;2. Flatten with fork.;3. Beat eggs with salt and pepper.;4. Dip eggplant in egg mixture.;5. Fry until golden on both sides.;6. Serve with ketchup or fish sauce.

name: Tortang Giniling
ingredients_str: Pork: 250g ground;Egg: 4;Onions: 1;Garlic: 4 cloves;Tomato: 1;Pepper: 1 tsp;Salt: 1 tsp
steps_str: 1. Sauté garlic, onion, and tomato.;2. Add ground pork, cook until brown.;3. Season with salt and pepper, cool.;4. Beat eggs, mix with cooked pork.;5. Fry patties until golden on both sides.;6. Serve hot.

name: Pritong Isda
ingredients_str: Fish: 4 pieces;Garlic: 6 cloves;Salt: 1 tsp;Pepper: 1 tsp
steps_str: 1. Clean and score fish.;2. Rub with salt and pepper.;3. Heat oil in pan.;4. Fry fish until golden and crispy on both sides.;5. Drain excess oil.;6. Serve with vinegar dip and tomatoes.

name: Pritong Manok
ingredients_str: Chicken: 1 kg pieces;Garlic: 8 cloves;Kalamansi: 6 pieces;Salt: 1 tsp;Pepper: 1 tsp
steps_str: 1. Marinate chicken with kalamansi, garlic, salt, and pepper for 30 minutes.;2. Heat oil in pan.;3. Fry chicken pieces until golden brown.;4. Cover and cook through, about 25 minutes.;5. Drain excess oil.;6. Serve hot with rice.

name: Pritong Talong
ingredients_str: Eggplant: 4;Garlic: 4 cloves crushed;Salt: 1 tsp
steps_str: 1. Slice eggplant lengthwise or in rounds.;2. Sprinkle with salt.;3. Heat oil in pan.;4. Fry eggplant until golden and soft.;5. Add crushed garlic while frying.;6. Drain and serve.

name: Ensaladang Talong
ingredients_str: Eggplant: 4;Tomato: 2;Onions: 1;FishSauce: 2 tbsp;Kalamansi: 4 pieces
steps_str: 1. Grill eggplant until soft.;2. Peel and chop roughly.;3. Chop tomatoes and onions.;4. Mix vegetables together.;5. Season with fish sauce and kalamansi juice.;6. Serve as side dish.

name: Ensaladang Pipino
ingredients_str: Tomato: 3;Onions: 1;FishSauce: 2 tbsp;Kalamansi: 4 pieces;SilingLabuyo: 2 pieces
steps_str: 1. Slice tomatoes and onions thinly.;2. Chop chilies.;3. Mix vegetables in bowl.;4. Season with fish sauce and kalamansi juice.;5. Let sit 10 minutes.;6. Serve as side dish.

name: Sinaing na Isda
ingredients_str: Fish: 4 pieces;Ginger: 1 thumb;Garlic: 8 cloves;Tomato: 2;SilingLabuyo: 4 pieces;FishSauce: 2 tbsp;Pepper: 1 tsp
steps_str: 1. Layer ginger and garlic in pot.;2. Place fish on top.;3. Add tomatoes and chilies.;4. Add fish sauce, pepper, and little water.;5. Cover and simmer 30 minutes.;6. Serve hot.

name: Sinaing na Tulingan
ingredients_str: Fish: 4 pieces tulingan;Ginger: 1 thumb;Garlic: 10 cloves;SilingLabuyo: 6 pieces;FishSauce: 3 tbsp;Pepper: 1 tsp
steps_str: 1. Layer ginger and garlic in pot.;2. Arrange fish in pot.;3. Add chilies, fish sauce, and pepper.;4. Add water to half-cover fish.;5. Simmer 45 minutes until sauce is thick.;6. Serve hot.

name: Pinaputok na Tilapia
ingredients_str: Fish: 4 tilapia;Tomato: 2;Onions: 1;Ginger: 1 thumb;SilingLabuyo: 4 pieces;FishSauce: 2 tbsp;Kalamansi: 4 pieces
steps_str: 1. Score fish and season with salt.;2. Stuff with tomato, onion, ginger, and chilies.;3. Wrap each fish in foil or banana leaves.;4. Grill or bake 20 minutes.;5. Open and drizzle with fish sauce and kalamansi.;6. Serve hot.

name: Relyenong Manok
ingredients_str: Chicken: 1 whole;Pork: 250g ground;Egg: 2;Garlic: 6 cloves;Onions: 1;Pepper: 1 tsp;Salt: 1 tsp
steps_str: 1. Debone chicken carefully, keeping skin intact.;2. Mix ground pork, eggs, garlic, onions, salt, and pepper.;3. Stuff mixture inside chicken.;4. Sew or tie opening.;5. Roast or bake 1.5 hours until golden.;6. Slice and serve.

name: Relyenong Bangus
ingredients_str: Fish: 2 large milkfish;Tomato: 2;Onions: 1;Garlic: 6 cloves;Egg: 1;Pepper: 1 tsp;Salt: 1 tsp
steps_str: 1. Carefully remove fish meat, keeping skin intact.;2. Flake fish meat and mix with chopped tomato, onion, garlic, egg, salt, and pepper.;3. Stuff mixture back into fish skin.;4. Wrap in foil or banana leaves.;5. Grill or bake 30 minutes.;6. Slice and serve.

name: Sinuglaw
ingredients_str: Fish: 300g;Pork: 200g grilled;Onions: 2;Ginger: 1 thumb;SilingLabuyo: 5 pieces;Kalamansi: 8 pieces;FishSauce: 2 tbsp
steps_str: 1. Grill pork until crispy, chop into pieces.;2. Cube fresh fish and marinate in kalamansi juice 10 minutes.;3. Drain fish slightly.;4. Mix fish and pork with onions, ginger, and chilies.;5. Season with fish sauce and more kalamansi.;6. Serve cold.

name: Kilawing Isda
ingredients_str: Fish: 500g fresh;Kalamansi: 12 pieces;Onions: 2;Ginger: 1 thumb;SilingLabuyo: 5 pieces;CoconutMilk: 1/2 cup;Salt: 1 tsp
steps_str: 1. Cube fresh fish.;2. Marinate in kalamansi juice 15 minutes.;3. Drain most liquid.;4. Add onions, ginger, chilies, and salt.;5. Mix in coconut milk.;6. Chill 30 minutes and serve.

name: Ginataang Gabi
ingredients_str: TaroRoots: 3 cups cubed;CoconutMilk: 2 cups;Shrimp: 1/2 cup;Garlic: 4 cloves;Onions: 1;Ginger: 1 thumb;FishSauce: 2 tbsp;SilingLabuyo: 3 pieces
steps_str: 1. Sauté garlic, onion, and ginger.;2. Add shrimp, cook until pink.;3. Add taro, cook 5 minutes.;4. Pour coconut milk, simmer 15 minutes until taro is tender.;5. Add fish sauce and chilies.;6. Serve hot.

name: Nilaga na Baka
ingredients_str: Pork: 1 kg beef shank;Corn: 2 ears;Pumpkin: 2 cups;Pechay: 1 bundle;Onions: 1;Pepper: 1 tbsp;FishSauce: 3 tbsp
steps_str: 1. Boil beef in water 2 hours until tender.;2. Add onions and pepper.;3. Season with fish sauce.;4. Add corn, cook 10 minutes.;5. Add pumpkin, cook 10 minutes.;6. Add pechay, cook 2 minutes and serve.

name: Nilaga na Baboy
ingredients_str: Pork: 1 kg;Corn: 2 ears;Pumpkin: 2 cups;Pechay: 1 bundle;Onions: 1;Pepper: 1 tbsp;FishSauce: 3 tbsp
steps_str: 1. Boil pork in water 1 hour until tender.;2. Add onions and pepper.;3. Season with fish sauce.;4. Add corn, cook 10 minutes.;5. Add pumpkin, cook 10 minutes.;6. Add pechay, cook 2 minutes and serve.

name: Sinigang na Isda
ingredients_str: Fish: 4 pieces;Tomato: 2;Onions: 1;Okra: 8 pieces;Eggplant: 1;WaterSpinach: 1 bundle;SilingLabuyo: 2 pieces;FishSauce: 2 tbsp
steps_str: 1. Boil water with tomato and onion.;2. Add okra and eggplant, cook 5 minutes.;3. Season with fish sauce.;4. Gently add fish, cook 10 minutes.;5. Add water spinach and chilies, cook 1 minute.;6. Serve hot.

name: Pesang Isda
ingredients_str: Fish: 4 pieces;Ginger: 1 thumb;Garlic: 6 cloves;Onions: 1;Tomato: 2;Pechay: 1 bundle;FishSauce: 2 tbsp;Pepper: 1 tsp
steps_str: 1. Sauté ginger, garlic, and onion.;2. Add tomatoes, cook until soft.;3. Add water and fish sauce, bring to boil.;4. Add fish, simmer 15 minutes.;5. Add pechay and pepper, cook 2 minutes.;6. Serve hot.

name: Caldereta
ingredients_str: Beef: 1.5 kg;Potatoes: 3;Carrots: 2;Bell Pepper: 1;Tomato Sauce: 2 cups;Liver Spread: 1/2 cup;Cheese: 1/4 cup;Green Olives: 1/4 cup;Garlic: 6 cloves;Onion: 1;Bay Leaves: 2;Water: 2 cups;Oil: 2 tbsp
steps_str: 1. Brown beef in oil.;2. Sauté garlic, onion, and beef.;3. Add tomato sauce, liver spread, bay leaves, and water. Simmer 60-90 mins.;4. Add potatoes and carrots, cook 15 mins.;5. Add bell pepper, olives, and cheese. Cook 5 mins.;6. Serve hot.

name: Chopsuey
ingredients_str: Pork: 250g;Cauliflower: 1 cup;Carrots: 1 cup;Cabbage: 2 cups;Snow Peas: 1 cup;Bell Pepper: 1;Broccoli: 1 cup;Garlic: 4 cloves;Onion: 1;Oyster Sauce: 3 tbsp;Soy Sauce: 1 tbsp;Chicken Broth: 1 cup;Cornstarch: 1 tbsp;Oil: 2 tbsp
steps_str: 1. Sauté garlic, onion, and pork until cooked.;2. Add carrots, cauliflower, broccoli. Stir-fry 3 mins.;3. Add broth, oyster sauce, soy sauce. Simmer 5 mins.;4. Add cabbage, bell pepper, snow peas. Cook 2 mins.;5. Thicken with cornstarch slurry.;6. Serve immediately.

name: Ginisang Gulay
ingredients_str: Ground Pork: 250g;Squash: 2 cups;String Beans: 1 cup;Eggplant: 2;Tomatoes: 2;Garlic: 4 cloves;Onion: 1;Fish Sauce: 1 tbsp;Oil: 2 tbsp;Water: 1/2 cup
steps_str: 1. Sauté garlic, onion, and tomatoes.;2. Add ground pork, cook until brown.;3. Add squash and water, simmer 5 mins.;4. Add string beans and eggplant, cook 7 mins.;5. Season with fish sauce.;6. Serve hot.

name: Kare-Kare
ingredients_str: Oxtail: 1 kg;Peanut Butter: 1 cup;Eggplant: 2;String Beans: 2 cups;Bok Choy: 1 bundle;Banana Blossom: 1;Garlic: 6 cloves;Onion: 1;Anatto Water: 1/2 cup;Rice Flour: 2 tbsp;Water: 8 cups;Shrimp Paste: to serve
steps_str: 1. Boil oxtail in water for 2-3 hours until tender.;2. Sauté garlic and onion.;3. Add oxtail and 4 cups broth.;4. Stir in peanut butter and rice flour.;5. Add annatto water for color.;6. Add vegetables and cook until tender.;7. Serve with shrimp paste.
ingredient_set: ['oxtail','peanut butter','eggplant','string beans','bok choy','banana blossom','garlic','onion','annatto water','rice flour','water','shrimp paste']

name: Pancit Canton
ingredients_str: Pancit Canton Noodles: 500g;Pork: 200g;Shrimp: 1 cup;Cabbage: 2 cups;Carrots: 1 cup;Celery: 1 cup;Snow Peas: 1 cup;Onion: 1;Garlic: 4 cloves;Oyster Sauce: 3 tbsp;Soy Sauce: 2 tbsp;Chicken Broth: 2 cups;Oil: 3 tbsp
steps_str: 1. Soak noodles in warm water.;2. Sauté garlic, onion, pork, and shrimp.;3. Add vegetables and stir-fry.;4. Add broth, oyster sauce, and soy sauce.;5. Add noodles and cook until liquid is absorbed.;6. Serve hot.

name: Paksiw na Isda
ingredients_str: Fish: 4 pieces;Ginger: 1 thumb;Garlic: 6 cloves;Onions: 1;Eggplant: 1;Chili Peppers: 3 pieces;Vinegar: 1/2 cup;Water: 1 cup;Fish Sauce: 2 tbsp;Pepper: 1 tsp
steps_str: 1. Layer ginger, garlic, and onion in pot.;2. Place fish on top.;3. Add eggplant and chili peppers.;4. Pour vinegar, water, and fish sauce. DO NOT STIR.;5. Bring to boil, simmer 15 minutes.;6. Season with pepper and serve.
